CAREER SUMMARY
May 2019 to date Siemens Energy
Position: Regional HR Business Partner
Managing largest business unit across Siemens Energy in the middle east of around 1500 employees and working closely with business leaders in HUB and in countries on strategic topics (development programs, inclusion and diversity, leadership development, employees engagement, resource management and distribution etc.. ) and operational topics, (Contracts, delegations, disciplinary actions, grievances, promotions, etc CANDIDATE 		Rima Zaidan
PERSONAL DETAILS
Location:		UAE
QUALIFICATIONS
Business Management AUL University Lebanon - AWARDED JUNE 2010
Certificates:
Inform Group: Job Analysis & Descriptions, Job Evaluation & Grades (2017)
Biz Group: International Leadership management certificate – ILM (2018)
CAREER SUMMARY
May 2019 to date Siemens Energy
Position: Regional HR Business Partner
Managing largest business unit across Siemens Energy in the middle east of around 1500 employees and working closely with business leaders in HUB and in countries on strategic topics (development programs, inclusion and diversity, leadership development, employees engagement, resource management and distribution etc.. ) and operational topics, (Contracts, delegations, disciplinary actions, grievances, promotions, etc..) ensuring consistency with local and global HR goals.
Working with cross functional teams in KSA, Qatar, Kuwait, Iraq, Bahrain, Egypt, and Qatar.
Collaborating with the global HR team on global topics and leading local implementations for companywide related projects or business-related projects.
Working closely with the internal HR center of excellence supporting recruitment, compensation& benefits and learning activities for the region.
Managing operational tasks at country level in connection with remote shared service center.
Driving the business performance in relation to the organization's objectives.
March 2015 to March 2019 du- Emirates Integrated Telecommunications
du is one of the two telecom operators in the United Arab Emirates which offers fixed line, mobile telephony, internet and digital television services across the UAE.
Nov 2017 to March 2019
Position: HR Business Partner
Looking at all employees related matters in terms of promotions, pay raise, grievances, retention, investigations, terminations, exist interviews, over time, internal movement, deduction, change management, job evaluations, etc…
Acting as HR excellence center for the business by representation all the HR functions which involved working closely with the recruitment, employee services, payroll, and talent management and audit teams.
Looking at enhancing the policies that are currently in place or looking at implanting new ones based on situations evolves.
Leading and executing the Performance Management (PM) cycle ensuring that all requirements and timescales for objective setting, mid/end of year reviews are met.
Looking at the Manpower activities related to budget forecast, planning and monitoring the Opex spent on monthly bases.
Coordinating with the finance and procurement team for different matters regarding the budget and outsourcing activities.
March 2015 to Nov 2017
Position: Recruitment Manager
• Managing all commercial recruitment activities covering mid to executive levels within consumer, enterprise and Brands and communications divisions.
• Working alongside the business units to understand their business objectives and translating them into talent requirements and maintaining it through performance measurements.
• Handling end-to-end recruitment processes, posting, screening, and competency-based
interviewing & assessment, salary negotiations and job offer.
• Managing volume hiring and recruitment campaigns projects.
• Responsible for overseeing opportunities for internal mobility and redeployment.
• Utilize a multiple sourcing technique including LinkedIn, direct headhunting, talent pool
development, social recruitment, job portals and advanced Boolean searching to find both active and passive candidates.
• Working with the marketing and communications team for the external and internal digital and social media communication strategy, including roadshows, career fairs and employer branding campaigns.
• Reducing the time to hire from 90 days to 35 days by introducing the pipeline strategy and the proactive search approach.
• Major contributor to the reduction in the cost of hire saving over 1 M on average per year.
• Worked on the project of introducing the new Taleo ATS system including working with different internal departments and external vendors on developing different features.
May 2014 to March 2015 DTCM (Dubai Tourism and Comme

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
